stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Hebrew Language Phishing Email Contains Poison Ivy RAT
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 22 September 2014, a phishing email in Hebrew language was sent from hiliknavon@gmail.com with the subject "למה שגאולה אבן תתפטר בגלל שהיא התאהבה?" to a user in Israel. It contained the attachment גאולה אבן‎.rar (MD5: 0C8E9807431E525D5D8728C6008EF041), which includes Poison Ivy remote administration tool (RAT). The Poison Ivy RAT calls back to kaswer12.strangled.net and kaswer13.zapto.org over port 443.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
---- BEGIN EMAIL HEADER ---- From hiliknavon@gmail.com Mon Sep 22 04:08:29 2014 Return-Path: <hiliknavon@gmail.com> Subject: =?utf-8?b?15zXnteUINep15LXkNeV15zXlCDXkNeR158g16rXqtek15jXqCDXkdeS15w=?= =?utf-8?b?15wg16nXlNeZ15Ag15TXqteQ15TXkdeUPw==?= X-SENDER-IP: 209.85.160.195 X-SENDER-REPUTATION: 2.6 Received: from mail-yk0-f195.google.com ([209.85.160.195]) 22 Sep 2014 09:12:13 +0000 Received: by mail-yk0-f195.google.com with SMTP id 79so460567ykr.2 ; Mon, 22 Sep 2014 02:12:13 -0700 (PDT) DKIM-Signature: v=1; a=rsa-sha256; c=relaxed/relaxed; d=gmail.com; s=20120113; h=mime-version:date:message-id:subject:from:to:content-type; bh=k4D4WJ9kzz29fPR7pTnJ+ENuB33SDpaO0ZOQoeRZroo=; b=tU3xZ4hsVjxAf68bePCtncmWuzV5OfPv03g7Y0RCg6IKc8LLyg/JOOaGuSMjWtjpoY 0oT/6BATT+k5LUeELxMuGPyBJHF5ClAKzzJjJFBf53dwYpdUQ54fRqhBZX8mqnDZbdqR c2QvLCh5/TN4BUFWRx99aocIrkIHHq7LyQuBI2B0sbXfafVG7m9msfyz/7nZdQ2yAqfs 8vTNInkTPaUou8xs9y4jq1V2H485lU7OHMKQFG/lLRiU8MT1TPPEZ4hKTAQ2LRaMrVPE GAfXqYJpQ+Pqq9KB0Z1IbcLlycdwEky7D4lj3TSZE1XGc24AAevrS3GrMy3uJdB7hgaG y6ow== MIME-Version: 1.0 X-Received: by 10.236.133.65 with SMTP id p41mr67192yhi.73.1411377132604; Mon, 22 Sep 2014 02:12:12 -0700 (PDT) Received: by 10.170.139.69 with HTTP; Mon, 22 Sep 2014 02:12:12 -0700 (PDT) Date: Mon, 22 Sep 2014 12:12:12 +0300 Message-ID: <CAGXQjLpkT7S7tNWFPdNTk6e068evFUP2A0Ojiuoy97Wb+AfNzg@mail.gmail.com> From: hilik navon <hiliknavon@gmail.com> To: undisclosed-recipients:; Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=20cf303e9fc8a252cb0503a3d825 ---- END EMAIL HEADER ----
---- BEGIN EMAIL BODY ---- האם היא מוכרחה לבחור בין האהבה למקצוע?
A loose translation of the email body from Hebrew to English: "Is she must choose between love for the profession?" ---- END EMAIL BODY ----

EmailMessageObj:Header.EmailMessageObj:Subject: למה שגאולה אבן תתפטר בגלל שהיא התאהבה?

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
The filename for this attachment was loosely translated as: "Geula Even .rar"
This .rar archive contains the file למה שגאולה אבן תתפטר בגלל שהיא התאהבה.scr (MD5: 3A580FCCF84C9D4C3EDB5453C32278E7).
The filename was loosely translated as: "Why Geula Even resign because she fell in love.Scr" It installs the Poison Ivy implant f.exe (MD5: c5f528ef682a7959747bae6d1020b1dc).

cybox:Properties.FileObj:File_Name: למה שגאולה אבן תתפטר בגלל שהיא התאהבה.scr

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
This is the Poison Ivy RAT with the password: admin2014
It calls back to kaswer12.strangled.net and kaswer13.zapto.org over port 443.
-------------------------------------------------------------- PIVY Configuration Block Discovered @ 0x36233 with XOR key 0x0 -------------------------------------------------------------- StubPath: StubPath ShellClass: SOFTWARE\Classes\http\shell\open\command ActiveSetup: Software\Microsoft\Active Setup\Installed Components\ ID: nbe Group: Dolsi
The Poison Ivy RAT f.exe (MD5: c5f528ef682a7959747bae6d1020b1dc) calls back to this domain.
